item.title: CVE-2024-31240|2024-04-10T16:03:15.257Z -- InfoTheme -- WP Poll Maker
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in InfoTheme WP Poll Maker.This issue affects WP Poll Maker: from n/a through 3.1.
